title: Track Upcoming Lease Expirations
description: A commercial property manager needs to identify all leases expiring in the next 12 months to begin renewal discussions.

tasks.description: Run a report to find all leases with an expiration date within the next 365 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all upcoming lease expirations.

tasks.description: For each expiring lease, review the renewal option clause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent notes the terms and notification deadline for each renewal option.

tasks.description: Create a task for the responsible agent to initiate renewal discussions with each tenant 9 months prior to expiration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and assigns follow-up tasks for each expiring lease.
